00054 namespace harps {
00055   namespace compornent {
00059     template< size_t size >
00060     class FFT {
00061       public:
00062         FFT ( int _inverse ) : inverse ( _inverse ) {
00063           float direction = -1.0f;
00064           if ( inverse )
00065             direction = 1.0f;
00066 
00067           int counter;
00068           for ( counter = 0; counter != size; counter++ ) {
00069             float angle =
00070               direction * 2.0f * static_cast< float > ( M_PI ) *
00071               static_cast< float > ( counter ) / static_cast< float > ( size );
00072             w[ counter ] = std::complex< float > ( cosf ( angle ), sinf ( angle ) );
00073           }
00074         }
00075         void operator() ( float *_buffer ) {
00076           boost::array< std::complex< float >, size > complex_buffer;
00077           int counter;
00078           for ( counter = 0; counter != size; counter++ )
00079             complex_buffer[ counter ] = std::complex< float > ( _buffer[ counter ], 0.0f );
00080           ( *this ) ( & ( complex_buffer.front() ) );
00081           for ( counter = 0; counter != size; counter++ )
00082             _buffer[ counter ] = complex_buffer[ counter ].real();
00083         }
00084         void operator() ( std::complex< float > *_buffer ) {
00085           swap ( _buffer );
00086           boost::array< std::complex< float >, size > swap_vector;
00087           std::complex< float > *swap = & ( swap_vector.front() );
00088           std::complex< float > *original_swap = swap;
00089           int counter;
00090           for ( counter = 2; counter <= size; counter <<= 1 ) {
00091             process ( swap, _buffer, counter );
00092             std::swap ( swap, _buffer );
00093           }
00094           if ( inverse )
00095             div ( _buffer );
00096           if ( swap != original_swap ) {
00097             std::swap ( swap, _buffer );
00098             memcpy ( _buffer, swap, sizeof ( std::complex< float > ) * size );
00099           }
00100         }
00101         void process ( std::complex< float > *_dest, std::complex< float > *_src, unsigned int _block_size ) {
00102           unsigned int counter;
00103           for ( counter = 0; counter != size; counter++ ) {
00104             unsigned int left = counter;
00105             unsigned int right = ( counter & ~ ( _block_size >> 1 ) ) | ( ~counter & ( _block_size >> 1 ) );
00106             if ( left > right ) {
00107               unsigned int temp = left;
00108               left = right;
00109               right = temp;
00110             }
00111             unsigned int w_step = size / _block_size;
00112             _dest[ counter ] = _src[ left ] + w[ ( counter % _block_size ) * w_step ] * _src[ right ];
00113           }
00114         }
00115       private:
00116         unsigned int flipBit ( unsigned int _value ) {
00117           int counter;
00118           unsigned int temp = 0;
00119           unsigned int log_size = log2f ( size );
00120           for ( counter = 0; counter != log_size; counter++ ) {
00121             temp <<= 1;
00122             temp |= ( _value >> counter ) & 0x01;
00123           }
00124           return temp;
00125         }
00126         void swap ( std::complex< float > *_buffer ) {
00127           unsigned int counter;
00128           for ( counter = 0; counter != size; counter++ ) {
00129             unsigned int flipped = flipBit ( counter );
00130             if ( counter < flipped )
00131               std::swap ( _buffer[ counter ], _buffer[ flipped ] );
00132           }
00133         }
00134         void div ( std::complex< float > *_buffer ) {
00135           unsigned int counter;
00136           for ( counter = 0; counter != size; counter++ )
00137             _buffer[ counter ] /= size;
00138         }
00139         boost::array< std::complex< float >, size > w;
00140         bool inverse;
00141     };
00146     template< unsigned int _lpf, unsigned int _hpf >
00147     class Noize {
00148       public:
00149         enum {
00150           CACHE_SIZE = 8192
00151         };
00152         Noize() : current_position ( 0 ),
00153             cache (
00154               SharedBuffer< Noize< _lpf, _hpf >, float, CACHE_SIZE >::init ( &Noize< _lpf, _hpf >::initCache )
00155             ) {}
00156         static void initCache ( boost::array< float, CACHE_SIZE > &_dest ) {
00157           static const float lpf = std::min ( std::max ( static_cast< float > ( _lpf ) / 1000.0f, 0.0f ), 1.0f );
00158           static const float hpf = std::min ( std::max ( static_cast< float > ( _hpf ) / 1000.0f, 0.0f ), 1.0f );
00159           boost::minstd_rand gen ( 512 );
00160           boost::uniform_real<> dst ( -1.0, 1.0 );
00161           boost::variate_generator <
00162           boost::minstd_rand&, boost::uniform_real<>
00163           > random ( gen, dst );
00164           boost::array< std::complex< float >, CACHE_SIZE > complex_cache;
00165           int index;
00166           for ( index = 0; index != CACHE_SIZE; index++ )
00167             complex_cache[ index ] = random();
00168           FFT< CACHE_SIZE > fft ( false );
00169           fft ( & ( complex_cache.front() ) );
00170           for ( index = 0; index < CACHE_SIZE * hpf; index++ )
00171             complex_cache[ index ] = 0.0f;
00172           for ( index = CACHE_SIZE * lpf; index != CACHE_SIZE; index++ )
00173             complex_cache[ index ] = 0.0f;
00174           FFT< CACHE_SIZE > ifft ( true );
00175           ifft ( & ( complex_cache.front() ) );
00176           for ( index = 0; index != CACHE_SIZE; index++ )
00177             _dest[ index ] = complex_cache[ index ].real();
00178         }
00179         template< typename SampleType >
00180         inline void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00181           int index;
00182           typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00183           for ( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ ) {
00184             if ( current_position == CACHE_SIZE )
00185               current_position = 0;
00186             raw_buffer[ index ] = cache[ current_position ];
00187             current_position++;
00188           }
00189         }
00190       private:
00191         void fft ( float *_dest, float *_source ) {
00192         }
00193         void ifft ( float *_dest, float *_source ) {
00194         }
00195         int current_position;
00196         boost::array< float, CACHE_SIZE > &cache;
00197     };
00198   }
00199 }
